resources.string:
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 57.9 million km (0.387 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.206
 **Orbital period:** 87.97 days
 **Average orbital speed:** 47.87 km/s
 **Inclination to ecliptic:** 7.005°
 **Satellites:** None
==Physical characteristics== **Equatorial radius:** 2,440 km (0.383 Earths)
 **Flattening:** 0
 **Volume:** 6.083×10^^10^^ km³ (0.056 Earths)
 **Mass:** 3.302×10^^23^^ kg (0.055 Earths)
 **Density:** 5.427 g/cm³
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** 3.7 m/s² (0.38 g)
 **Escape velocity:** 4.25 km/s
 **Sidereal rotation period:** 58.6 days
 **Equatorial rotation velocity:** 10.9 km/h
 **Axial tilt:** 2.11′
 **Bond albedo:** 0.068
 **Surface temperature:** 80K to 700K
==Atmosphere== **Atmosphere:** trace
 **Atmospheric composition:**
 42% molecular oxygen
 29% sodium
 22% hydrogen
 6% helium
 0.5% potassium
 Trace amounts of argon, nitrogen, carbon dioxide, water vapor, xenon, krypton and neon.


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mercury_(planet)|wikipedia]].
